update sales_ranking_type set time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_id = #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_code = #{dealerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_name = #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_model_id = #{vehicleModelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_model_code = #{vehicleModelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_model_name = #{vehicleModelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, market_activity_id = #{marketActivityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, market_activity_code = #{marketActivityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, market_activity_name = #{marketActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT time FROM sales_ranking_type WHERE dealer_id = #{dealerId} ORDER BY substring_index(time,'-',1) + 0 DESC, substring_index(time,'-',-1) + 0 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_ranking_type(id,time,dealer_id,dealer_code,dealer_name,vehicle_model_id, vehicle_model_code,vehicle_model_name,create_time) SELECT UUID() AS id,CONCAT(YEAR(#{beginDate}),'-',MONTH(#{beginDate})) AS time, dealer_id,dealer_code,dealer_name,vehicle_model_id,vehicle_model_code,vehicle_model_name,NOW() FROM sales_record WHERE buy_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY dealer_id,vehicle_model_id

INSERT INTO sales_ranking_type(id,time,dealer_id,dealer_code,dealer_name,vehicle_model_name,create_time) SELECT UUID() AS id,CONCAT(YEAR(#{beginDate}),'-',MONTH(#{beginDate})) AS time, dealer_id,dealer_code,dealer_name,'全车型',NOW() FROM sales_record WHERE buy_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY dealer_id
